programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Take A Hike / The Great Bumpo
programme.desc: "Take A Hike": While hiking, Pinky and friends are forced to spend all of their time looking for Panky. "The Great Bumpo": Elephant trainer Rottley's abusive treatment causes Bumpo the elephant to run away, and the Panthers decide to hide him.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Spinning Wheels / Haunted Howlers
programme.desc: A new bicycle is the prize for the winner of a race between Finko and Pinky.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Pinky At The Bat / Pink Enemy #1
programme.desc: A dispute over a ball field results in a challenge baseball game. But Finko is up to the usual dirty tricks.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Pink Encounters Of The Panky Kind / Traders Of The Lost Bark
programme.desc: Spacemen replace the real Panky with a robot who impresses the Panthers with its cool abilities.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Millionaire Murfel / The Pursuit Of Panky
programme.desc: Master Graystrips realizes that Murfel is his exact double and persuades him to trade places for a day.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Sitter Jitters / The Fix-Up, Foul-Up
programme.desc: Pinky and Chatta go to a horror movie, leaving Finko as Panky's Panther-sitter!

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Joking Genie / Panky's Pet
programme.desc: While the Panthers are on a tropical cruise, Panky finds a dinosaur egg.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Sleeptalking Chatta / Punkin's Home Companion
programme.desc: Finko and Chatta each want to win tickets to the Grey Cats Concert, but it is Chatta who wins!

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Rocko's Last Round / The Pink Link
programme.desc: The Panthers mistakenly believe Rocko is dying. So, they lavish him with gifts.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Pink Shrink / Anney's Invention
programme.desc: Anney's new invention accidentally shrinks Pinky to mouse size.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Panky And The Angels / Insanity Claus
programme.desc: Excluded from a Panther meeting, Panky decides to join up with Howl's Angels!

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: Brothers Are Special / Arabian Frights
programme.desc: Finko and Howl's Angels plan to win a talent contest...by cheating, of course.

programme.title: Pink Panther And Sons
programme.sub-title: A Hardy Day's Knight / Mister Money
programme.desc: During a tour of Medieval Manor, Panky wanders off and armored robot knights wreak havoc!

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pink, Pink And Away / Down On The Ant Farm
programme.desc: Super Pink flies into action when the Dogfather robs a bank and then accidentally kidnaps a little boy.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pinky In Paradise / Department Store Pink-Erton
programme.desc: Aided by a Parrot, Pinky searches for buried treasure only to come up against a Voodoo Man.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pink Pizza / The Pink Painter
programme.desc: Pinky helps the owner of a pizza parlor compete against a glitzy pizza conglomerate.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Big Top Pinky / Yeti 'Nother Bigfoot Story
programme.desc: Pinky dreams of stardom in the circus and discovers his calling is as a clown.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pink And Quiet / The Pinky 500
programme.desc: Pinky can't sleep so he moves to the country where he meets a little girl who makes his life miserable.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pilgrim Panther / That Old Pink Magic
programme.desc: Puritan Chef Pinky competes with an Indian Brave to capture a wild turkey.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pink-Anderthal Man / Pink Kong
programme.desc: Manly Man pursues the Panther through the ages.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Moby Pink / The Pink Stuff
programme.desc: Pinky accidentally stows away on a broken-down fishing scow, skippered by an old salt searching for a great off-white whale.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Rock Me Pink / Pinkus Pantherus
programme.desc: While trying to get a heavy metal rock star to play his song, Pinky becomes the concert's main attraction.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: A Werewolf in Panther's Clothing / Pink Paparazzi
programme.desc: Pinky encounters a werewolf in a spooky European village where the inhabitants are all a little batty.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: The Magnificent Pink One / Downhill Panther
programme.desc: When a town needs a new Sheriff, Pinky gets the job, but the baddie Brothers are comin' to town.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: 14 Karat Pink / Robo-Pink
programme.desc: The Panther tries to claim the Lollapalooza Gold Vein but Manly Man has other ideas.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: The Ghost And Mr. Panther / Cleopanthra
programme.desc: Pinky unknowingly takes a job as a house sitterâ€¦at a haunted house!

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pink Encounters / Junkyard Pink Blues
programme.desc: The Panther mistakes an alien spaceship for his pink caddie and inadvertently blasts into space.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pantherobics / Pinkenstein
programme.desc: In order to get on a TV show, Pinky goes through a rigorous training routine with a gruff personal trainer.

programme.title: The New Pink Panther Show
programme.sub-title: Pinky...He Delivers / Super Pink's Egg-cellent Adventure
programme.desc: A modern Red Riding Hood hires Pinky to deliver a mysterious goodie to Grandma's house, which is under water.
